name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Firebnb - Sort Airbnb Listings by Rating (Alpha)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Airbnb experience by sorting listings based on ratings. Currently under active development.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Firebnb lets you sort Airbnb listings by rating, helping you quickly find the best stays for your trips. Simply specify how many pages to scrape, and Firebnb will display the highest-rated properties.

How It Works
1. Install Firebnb and open Airbnb
2. Start a trial or subscribe
3. Specify the number of pages to scrape in the Firebnb pop-up
4. Click "Scrape and Sort" to see top-rated listings in an organized view
